Name: pilot_babel
Description: Under the leadership of Theresa, the Sarkaz Queen of Kazdel, Babel was active throughout the civil war that ravaged Kazdel as the main opposing force to Theresis, consisting of both brilliant thinkers such as an enigmatic "Doctor", Kal'tsit, and Closure, and soldiers including mercenaries. Babel is based on an ex-RIM Billiton landship christened "Rhodes Island".
